content: Noted Trump supporter James Dolan has been making the Knicks great again for the last 15 years. It’s a straight shot, and it’s sad you can’t just grow up and get on with the business of making the Knicks great again. I don’t think anyone has written an article that seriously considers the idea that Phil Jackson might be actively sabotaging the Knicks. I mean, you’re some woke hippy from BasketballLand with your 11 rings and you have to work for one of the bitch orcs from Mordor while he’s giving millions to Trump? I’d fuck that team over, and I like the Knicks.
